headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok Business Accounts. To obtain a short-term TikTok account access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the Business Account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: is_personalized
parameters.description: Whether to return personalized search keywords for the Business Account. Supported values: true : To return trending search keywords that are personalized for the Business Account. false : To return trending search keywords that are not personalized for the Business Account. Default value: false .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: search_keywords
fields.description: A list of 20 trending search keywords.
